### CheckNot() {#ae85a64defc7f9bea8408ca9e64e3fc45}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool FileCheckString::CheckNot (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp; SM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Buffer, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecheckstring/dagnotprefixinfo">DagNotPrefixInfo</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; NotStrings, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecheckrequest">FileCheckRequest</a> &amp; Req, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecheckdiag">FileCheckDiag</a> &gt; &#42; Diags) const</>}>
Verifies that none of the strings in <code>NotStrings</code> are found in the given <code>Buffer</code>.

Errors are reported against <code>SM</code> and diagnostics recorded in <code>Diags</code> according to the verbosity level set in <code>Req</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h/#l00858">858</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h">FileCheckImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l02307">2307</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.
